help.title: Clipboard Share User Guide
help.intro: is a web application that allows you to share files and text in real-time. Through room codes, multiple users can instantly share clipboard content in the same space.
help.feature1Desc: Instantly share various files such as images and documents
help.feature2Desc: Share text content such as code, links, and notes
help.feature3Desc: 6-digit room code automatically generated upon connection
help.feature4Desc: Select multiple files and download them all at once as a ZIP
help.fileShare1Step2: Paste anywhere on the page (Ctrl+V / Cmd+V)
help.fileShare1Step3: Automatically uploaded and shared with all participants
help.fileShare2Desc: Click the button on the file upload card to select files.
help.textShareAutoDesc: After copying text, paste (Ctrl+V / Cmd+V) on the page to automatically share.
help.textShareCopyDesc: Click on shared text to automatically copy to clipboard.
help.textShareDeleteDesc: Click the trash icon that appears when you hover over the text.
help.downloadSingleDesc: Click on a file card to download that file.
help.downloadMultiStep1: Click the checkbox on file cards to select
help.downloadMultiStep2: Download as ZIP with "Download Selected" button
help.downloadMultiStep3: Download individual files simultaneously with "Download Selected in Parallel"
help.downloadAllDesc: Download all files as ZIP with "Download All" button.
help.roomCreateDesc: A 6-digit room code is automatically generated when you access the page. Share this code with other users.
help.roomJoinDesc: Click the "Join Other Room" button and enter the 6-digit room code to join that room.
help.roomCopyDesc: Click the copy button next to the room code to copy the code to clipboard.
help.limit1: File size limit: Maximum 10MB per file
help.limit2: Rooms are automatically deleted when the last user leaves
help.limit3: Browser clipboard copy supports single files only
help.tip1: You can take a screenshot and share it immediately with Ctrl+V
help.tip2: You don't need to be on the same network, just the room code
help.tip3: All files and text are synchronized in real-time
